medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient sought medical attention due to the onset of pain and redness in the palmar region.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had noticed redness in the palmar region for several years. The pain began at some point before seeking medical attention. Pain and redness were especially pronounced when gripping objects. There were no changes in finger mobility, and similar symptoms were not observed in other body regions.
